== Azhikode South (CT) (627231) ==

Azhikode South (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 7.44 sq. km. and harbouring 5512 households with total population of 25195 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 9 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 524 km. Male population is 11369 and female population is 13826. Scheduled Caste population is 917 and Scheduled Tribes population is 33. Census Location Code of the town is 627231<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 59 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 94 km. Railway station is at Valapattanam at a distance of 4 km.
